trans-unit.source: Represents a set of conditions that must be taken into account when assessing the validity of a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: Representa um conjunto de condições que devem ser levadas em conta ao avaliar a validade de uma asserção SAML.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken> security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions and a set of conditions that must be taken into account when assessing the validity of the SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>tokens de segurança especificam suas declarações usando asserções SAML e um conjunto de condições que devem ser levadas em conta ao avaliar a validade de asserção SAML.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: The SamlConditions class represents the set of conditions.
trans-unit.target: A classe SamlConditions representa o conjunto de condições.

trans-unit.source: An example of a condition is whether the SAML assertion must not be cached, which is represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition> class.
trans-unit.target: Um exemplo de uma condição é se a asserção SAML deve não ser armazenada em cache, que é representado pela <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition>classe.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition>

trans-unit.source: The SAML specification defines two conditions and it allows for the set of conditions to be extended.
trans-unit.target: A especificação de SAML define duas condições e permite o conjunto de condições para ser estendido.

trans-unit.source: The two conditions defined by the SAML specification are <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition>.
trans-unit.target: As duas condições definidas pela especificação de SAML são <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition>e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlDoNotCacheCondition> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlAudienceRestrictionCondition>

trans-unit.source: To define a new condition, derive a class from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlCondition> class.
trans-unit.target: Para definir uma nova condição, derive uma classe da <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlCondition>classe.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlCondition>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.IsReadOnly%2A>propriedade `false`.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions"></xref> class using the specified timeframe that the SAML assertion is valid.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions"> </xref> classe usando o período de tempo especificado se a asserção SAML é válida.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter%2A> properties are stored in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A>e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter%2A>propriedades são armazenadas no tempo Universal Coordenado (UTC).</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the earliest instant in time when the SAML assertion is valid.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.DateTime>que especifica o instantâneo mais antigo no tempo quando a declaração SAML é válida.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore*> property.
trans-unit.target: Conjuntos de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore*>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the instant in time when the SAML assertion expires.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.DateTime>que especifica o instantâneo na hora de expiração de asserção SAML.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter*> property.
trans-unit.target: Conjuntos de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter*>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions"></xref> class using the specified timeframe and conditions when the SAML assertion is valid.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions"> </xref> classe usando o período de tempo especificado e condições quando a declaração SAML é válida.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter%2A> properties are stored in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A>e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter%2A>propriedades são armazenadas no tempo Universal Coordenado (UTC).</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the earliest instant in time when the SAML assertion is valid.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.DateTime>que especifica o instantâneo mais antigo no tempo quando a declaração SAML é válida.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore*> property.
trans-unit.target: Conjuntos de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore*>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the instant in time when the SAML assertion expires.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.DateTime>que especifica o instantâneo na hora de expiração de asserção SAML.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter*> property.
trans-unit.target: Conjuntos de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter*>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlCondition"></xref> that specifies a set of conditions that a recipient of a SAML assertion must take into account in assessing the validity of the assertion.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> do tipo <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlCondition"> </xref> que especifica um conjunto de condições que um destinatário de uma asserção SAML deve levar em conta a avaliar a validade da asserção.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.Conditions*> property.
trans-unit.target: Conjuntos de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.Conditions*>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.Conditions*>

trans-unit.source: conditions contains a member that is .
trans-unit.target: conditionscontém um membro que é .

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of conditions that must be taken into consideration when assessing the validity of a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o conjunto de condições que devem ser levadas em consideração ao avaliar a validade de uma asserção SAML.

trans-unit.source: The Conditions property corresponds to the `\<saml:Conditions>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade condições corresponde do `\<saml:Conditions>` elemento que é definido no protocolo e asserções para a especificação do OASIS SAML Security Assertion Markup Language ().

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlCondition"></xref> that specifies a set of conditions that a recipient of a SAML assertion must take into account when assessing the validity of the assertion.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> do tipo <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlCondition"> </xref> que especifica um conjunto de condições que um destinatário de uma asserção SAML deve levar em conta ao avaliar a validade da asserção.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the properties of this instance are read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as propriedades desta instância são somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: To make this instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions> class read-only, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.MakeReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para tornar essa instância do <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions>chamada de classe somente leitura, o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.MakeReadOnly%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.MakeReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the properties of this instance are read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as propriedades desta instância são somente leitura; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Causes this instance to be read-only.
trans-unit.target: Faz com que essa instância para ser somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: When the MakeReadOnly method is called, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.IsReadOnly%2A> property is set to `true` and properties of this instance can no longer be set.
trans-unit.target: Quando o método MakeReadOnly é chamado, o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.IsReadOnly%2A>está definida como `true` e propriedades desta instância não podem ser definidas.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the earliest instant in time when the SAML assertion is valid.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o instantâneo mais antigo no tempo quando a declaração SAML é válida.

trans-unit.source: The NotBefore property corresponds to the `NotBefore` attribute of the `<saml:Conditions>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade NotBefore corresponde do `NotBefore` atributo do `<saml:Conditions>` elemento que é definido no protocolo e asserções para a especificação do OASIS SAML Security Assertion Markup Language ().

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the earliest instant in time when the SAML assertion is valid.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.DateTime>que especifica o instantâneo mais antigo no tempo quando a declaração SAML é válida.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets the instant in time when the SAML assertion expires.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o instantâneo na hora de expiração de asserção SAML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A> property corresponds to the `NotOnOrAfter` attribute of the `<saml:Conditions>` element that is defined in the Assertions and Protocol for the OASIS Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) specification.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A>propriedade corresponde do `NotOnOrAfter` atributo do `<saml:Conditions>` elemento que é definido no protocolo e asserções para a especificação do OASIS SAML Security Assertion Markup Language ().</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that specifies the instant in time when the SAML assertion expires.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.DateTime>que especifica o instantâneo na hora de expiração de asserção SAML.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Conditions>" name="<saml:Conditions>" href=""></xref> element from the specified XML reader.
trans-unit.target: Lê o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Conditions>" name="<saml:Conditions>" href=""> </xref> elemento do leitor de XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: The ReadXml method sets the following properties: - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter%2A> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A> - <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.Conditions%2A>
trans-unit.target: O método ReadXml define as propriedades a seguir:- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter%2A>- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A>- <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.Conditions%2A></xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.Conditions%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotBefore%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions.NotOnOrAfter%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader> to read the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Conditions>" name="<saml:Conditions>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>para ler o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Conditions>" name="<saml:Conditions>" href=""> </xref> elemento.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of reading XML elements in the SAML authorization statement that is defined in the SAML specification.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref> que é capaz de ler a declaração de autorização de SAML que é definido na especificação de SAML elementos XML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that reads the <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clause of the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> que lê o <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""> </xref> cláusula da assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"></xref> that determines the security token that created the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver"> </xref> que determina o token de segurança que criou a assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: reader is -or- samlSerializer is .
trans-unit.target: readeris -or- samlSerializer is .

trans-unit.source: Writes the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Conditions>" name="<saml:Conditions>" href=""></xref> element into the specified XML serializer.
trans-unit.target: Grava o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Conditions>" name="<saml:Conditions>" href=""> </xref> elemento para o serializador XML especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the WriteXml method to write the current <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions> instance into a `<saml:Conditions>` element.
trans-unit.target: Use o método WriteXml para gravar atual <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions>instância em um `<saml:Conditions>` elemento.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlConditions>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter> to write the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Conditions>" name="<saml:Conditions>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>para gravar o <xref uid="langword_csharp_<saml:Conditions>" name="<saml:Conditions>" href=""> </xref> elemento.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing XML elements in a SAML assertion.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SamlSerializer"> </xref> que é capaz de gravar elementos XML em uma asserção SAML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"></xref> that is capable of writing <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""></xref> clauses.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer"> </xref> que é capaz de gravar <xref uid="langword_csharp_KeyInfo" name="KeyInfo" href=""> </xref> cláusulas.

trans-unit.source: writer is -or- samlSerializer is .
trans-unit.target: writeris -or- samlSerializer is .
